subject: Add auto-loading of sample images when no images uploaded
body:
- Added loadSampleImage function to useAdState
- Picks a random sample image and assigns to layout's image cell
- Auto-triggers on app mount if images array is empty
- Added future TODO items for text styling in Looks

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GjPKuSJZuDMoStckvT7wR5
title: Add auto-loading of sample images when no images uploaded
